news_header: Finnair improved its performance, with a comparable operating result rising to EUR 47.9 million. Neste will enter change negotiations, potentially leading to 600 job reductions.
news_original_title: Yle seuraa tulospäivää: Outokummun liikevaihto laski, S-ryhmän tulos kasvoi
news_text: Outokumpu reported a loss of EUR 3 million in adjusted EBITDA, down from a profit of EUR 72 million last year, and will abandon its cold rolling expansion project in the U.S. The S-Group's operating result grew by nearly 12%, reaching EUR 499 million, with online food sales increasing by 18%. Metso's order book increased by 13%, but net sales fell by 5%.
